TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MultiplayerSessionMemberStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines values used to indicate status for member of a session.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Multiplayer.MultiplayerSessionMemberStatus Active = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The member is active in the current title.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Multiplayer.MultiplayerSessionMemberStatus Inactive = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The member is inactive in the current title. The member may be active in another title as specified by ActiveTitleId, If a inactive member doesn't mark themselves as Active within the MemberInactiveTimeout they will be removed from the session.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Multiplayer.MultiplayerSessionMemberStatus Ready = int32(2)

Docs.summary: When the shell launches the title to start a multiplayer game, the member is marked as ready. If a ready member doesn't mark themselves as Active within the MemberReadyTimeout they will be marked as inactive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Multiplayer.MultiplayerSessionMemberStatus Reserved = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The member slot is reserved for a specific Xbox User ID. This specific member must join the session to fill the reservation before the JoinTimeout or they will be removed.
